title: Playback - TS Silk Stream with Ads (Archive)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Archived State
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the play button
custom_expected:
THEN users should see playback start
AND the ad breaks should pull from Google

title: Playback - TS Silk Stream without Ads (Archive)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Archived State
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the play button
custom_expected:
THEN users should see playback start
AND there shouldn't be an Ad Break during the stream

title: Playback - CMAF Stream with Ads (Live)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Live State
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the play button
custom_expected:
THEN users should see Live player
AND playback starts
AND the ad breaks should pull from Google

title: Playback - CMAF Stream without Ads (Live)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Live State
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the play button
custom_expected:
THEN users should see Live player
AND playback starts
AND the ad breaks should pull from Google

title: Playback - Multiview (1 Archive & 1 Live)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Live State
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the Games tab on the top
AND the user selects a multiview option
AND the user selects an archived game
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the multiview video display
AND the users should see both games have playback
AND the archived video will be muted

title: Playback - Multiview (2 Live Streams)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Live State
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the Games tab on the top
AND the user selects a multiview option
AND the user selects another live game
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the multiview video display
AND the users should see both games have playback
AND the second live video will be muted

title: Playback - Switching Between Live and Archive Streams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Live State
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the Games tab on the top
AND the user selects a game in the archived state
AND user selects a game in the live state
custom_expected:
THEN the users should see the out of town scoreboard
AND the user should see playback
AND the user should see playback

title: Playback - Switching between Live Streams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has logged in with an entitled MLB.com Account
AND users have navigated to a game in the Live State
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the Games tab on the top
AND user selects a game in the live state
custom_expected:
THEN the users should see the out of town scoreboard
AND the user should see playback

title: Playback (Live) - Radio (Audio Only)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to listen to the Audio Only stream
AND users have navigated to a live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click BROADCAST
AND users select a stream in the Audio only section
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video player change to Audio Only
AND audio playback will start from the point users were in during the video playback

title: Playback (Live) - Alternate Audio Overlays (English)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to watch a Live or Archived video stream
AND users have navigated to a live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on BROADCAST
AND users select the English Broadcast
custom_expected:
THEN users should see the video playback
AND the audio will be pulled from the English Broadcast

title: Playback (Live) - Alternate Audio Overlays (Spanish)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to watch a Live or Archived video stream
AND users have navigated to a live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on BROADCAST
AND users select the Spanish Broadcast
custom_expected:
THEN users should see the video playback
AND the audio will be pulled from the Spanish Broadcast

title: Playback (Live) - Alternate Audio Overlays (Ballpark)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to watch a Live or Archived video stream
AND users have navigated to a live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on BROADCAST
AND users select the Spanish Broadcast
custom_expected:
THEN users should see the video playback
AND the audio will be pulled directly from the ballpark

title: Playback (Archive) - Radio (Audio Only)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to listen to the Audio Only stream
AND users have navigated to an archived stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click BROADCAST
AND users select a stream in the Audio only section
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video player change to Audio Only
AND audio playback will start from the point users were in during the video playback

title: Playback (Archive) - Alternate Audio Overlays (English)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to listen to the Audio Only stream
AND users have navigated to an archived stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click BROADCAST
AND users select a stream in the Audio only section
AND the user selects Alternate Audio
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video player change to Audio Only
AND audio playback will start from the point users were in during the video playback
AND the user will hear the Alternate Audio feed.

title: Playback (Archive) - Alternate Audio Overlays (Spanish)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to listen to the Audio Only stream
AND users have navigated to an archived stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click BROADCAST
AND users select a stream in the Audio only section
AND the user selects Spanish Audio
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video player change to Audio Only
AND audio playback will start from the point users were in during the video playback
AND the user will hear the Spanish Audio feed.

title: Playback (Archive) - Alternate Audio Overlays (Ballpark)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are entitled to listen to the Audio Only stream
AND users have navigated to an archived stream
custom_steps:
WHEN users click BROADCAST
AND users select a stream in the Audio only section
AND the user selects the Ball Park Audio
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video player change to Audio Only
AND audio playback will start from the point users were in during the video playback
AND the user will hear the audio from the Ballpark.

title: Branding - Team Logo's display on the top left
Access - Users login with Root Sports Cable Auth
Authorized Playback - Premium Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account is entitled with a MLB.tv entitlement
AND the user has logged into MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a video feed
custom_expected: THEN the user should receive playback.

title: Authorized Playback - Unauthorized Playback Attempt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the account doesn't have a MLB.tv entitlement
OR the account has a single team entitlement
AND the user has logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user tries to access a MLB.tv stream
OR a MLB.tv stream that is outside of the single team users account
custom_expected: THEN the user should be blocked from playback.

title: Authorize Playback - Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account is entitled with a MLB.tv entitlement
AND the user has logged into MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to start video playback for a stream that is blacked out to their location, (blacked out streams will be based on the locations, you can check the blacked out games for your location here: https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe#blackout-restrictions)
custom_expected: THEN users will be unable to achieve playback

title: Authorize Playback - Blackout Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account is entitled with a MLB.tv entitlement
AND the user has logged into MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to start video playback for a stream that is blacked out to their location
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be blocked from playback
AND the user will see the following message:

>This Game is Blacked Out in Your Area. Audio only streaming is available on MLB.TV web and in the AtBat App. All blacked out games are available for archive streaming starting 2-hours after the end of the game.

title: Authorize Playback - Follow Your Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has a Follow Your Team entitlement
AND the user has logged into mlb.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens a stream they are entitled to
custom_expected: THEN the user should see playback.

title: Authorize Playback - Login Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to MLB.com/live-stream-games
AND the user has not logged into MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens up a live stream
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the login screen

title: Authorize Playback - Create Account w/ Authorization
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to MLB.com/live-stream-games
AND the user has not logged into MLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens up a live stream or archived stream
AND the user successfully purchases OR authenticates with MLB Extra Innings
AND the user links an existing MLB.com account OR links to a newly created account
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the login screen
AND the user will see playback

title: Authorize Playback - Create Account w/o Authorization
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to MLB.com/live-stream-games
AND the user has not logged into MLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens up a live stream or archived stream
AND the user logs in with an un-entitled MLB.com account
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the login screen
AND the user will be blocked from playback 
AND a toaster message will appear

title: Authorize Playback - Concurrency Cap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the user has logged in with an MLB.com account that is entitled
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a video stream from 6 different devices/browsers, (will be dropped down to 4 devices).
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a toaster message confirming that they are logged in, in too many places
AND the user will see a Telemetry call being made every couple of seconds on the different devices/browsers.

title: Settings - Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the user has logged in with an MLB.com account that is entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user access' stream (live or archive)
AND the user selects a favorite team
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see their favorite team displayed first.

The following order for favorite or followed teams are: 1) Favorite 2) Followed 3) Games listed from earliest to latest, EST.

title: Settings - Followed Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the user has logged in with an MLB.com account that is entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user access' stream (live or archive)
AND the user selects a followed team
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see their favorite team displayed first.

The following order for favorite or followed teams are: 1) Favorite 2) Followed 3) Games listed from earliest to latest, EST.

title: Settings - Favorite & Followed Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the user has logged in with an MLB.com account that is entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user access' stream (live or archive)
AND the user selects a favorite and followed team
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see their favorite team displayed first
AND the user will see their followed team displayed after.

The following order for favorite or followed teams are: 1) Favorite 2) Followed 3) Games listed from earliest to latest, EST.
